snippet: Nader Saadeh, 20, who lived in Rutherford, N.J., until he left the United States in May, was charged with conspiracy and seeking to provide material aid to a terrorist group.
abstract: Federal prosecutors charge Nader Saadeh of Rutherford, NJ, with conspiracy and trying to provide material support for Islamic State group; Saadeh was detained in May in Jordan after authorities were told by Saadeh's acquaintance that he was trying to join terrorist group.
lead_paragraph: Nader Saadeh, 20, who lived in Rutherford, N.J., until he left the United States in May, was charged with conspiracy and seeking to provide material aid to a terrorist group.

headline.main: New Jersey Man Charged With Plotting to Support ISIS
headline.print_headline: Man Charged in New Jersey With Plotting to Aid ISIS

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
